code: import axios from"axios";axios.defaults.baseURL="/api";export async function loginApi(email,password){const res=await axios.post("/v1/auth/login",{email,password});return res.data.token;}export async function registerApi(email,password){const res=await axios.post("/v1/auth/register",{email,password});return res.data.token;}export async function getMeApi(){const res=await axios.get("/v1/auth/me");return res.data;}export function setAuthToken(token){axios.defaults.headers.common["Authorization"]="Bearer ".concat(token);}export function removeAuthToken(){delete axios.defaults.headers.common["Authorization"];}
